action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Hashem, Lamosao, Morikawa, Woodson, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Iwamoto, Souza; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Poepoe.
